cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on July 28, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8503, Securing Global Telecommunications Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 124 (Tuesday, July 26, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MANNING:
H.R. 8503.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 3 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution
[Page H7171]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Securing Global Telecommunications Act
